name: Hampton Inn & Suites Windsor - Sonoma Wine Country

reviews.text: I stay here everytime my friends and I go to Healdsburg. The hotel is perfect - it's clean, quiet, safe and the staff is more than accomodating and very friendly. I have never had a bad experience at this hotel, and would recommend it to everyone.
reviews.title: Great hotel!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed March 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Just stayed the weekend at Hampton Inn. I've had good luck with Hampton Inn so far and this was what I expected. Comfy, clean, good service. Check in/out a total breeze. The location is great if you want to check out Russian River breweries or other nearby places. We had a great time in Healdsburg.
reviews.title: Nice place to stay in Russian River

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed March 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: I would return here.
reviews.title: A great value in an area where decent hotel prices can be ghastly

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed March 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: My wife and I have stayed here twice for weekend jaunts and we we're pretty satisfied with our experiences. This hotel seems like a good base camp for forays into various areas of Sonoma. Our particular destination for both times has been Healdsburg (10 minutes away from d-town H.burg) and it's wonderful shopping/dining destinations. I used a combination of Hilton loyalty program member points and pre-pay $ to book the room to keep costs down to a minimum.
reviews.title: Perfect Location for Dry Creek and Anderson Valley Wineries

reviews.text: Check-ins were very pleasant and prompt. Thought not a luxury property (Not nestled in some foothill vineyard but a shopping area) it's hard to beat for sheer convenience. It's very close to the highway. Nice spacious rooms and suites. There's a pool and hot tub, a pretty nice fitness room by most hotel standards with actual no-rusting free-weights (Finally!), the beds were very nice with a decent level of support. Breakfasts were adequate but of course they get swamped by guests in the mornings. Grocery/pharmacy shopping just down the road. Gotta feed the kids ASAP? There's an Applebee's on the property so you can "get her done".
reviews.title: Nice place to stay in wine country

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed March 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: First time stay at a Hampton Inn for my husband and I and another couple. We purchased a voucher off of Amazon Local for 1 night and decided to stay for an additional night. I'm so glad we did. The rooms were large with comfy beds and lots of pillows, mini-fridges and microwaves, large bathrooms, and very quiet. We were nervous as our rooms were near the elevators but we never heard any hallway noise or elevator noises during the night. The rooms and the hotel as a whole were very clean and neat. The breakfast in the morning offered many choices and was very filling. We had complimentary wine tasting our first night in addition to the fresh baked cookies. And the Staff! They were fantastic! Everyone was incredibly friendly and accommodating. We are already planning another trip to Windsor and will be staying at the Hampton again.
reviews.title: Great hotel, wonderful staff

reviews.text: This was used as a base to explore the Russian River on a recent expedition for wine country business I was attending. The staff were so kind and helpful, as well the free breakfast in the morning felt like a great value from head to toe.
reviews.title: Great Accommodations for a Weekend

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed February 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Perfect location to jump on and off the highway into Sonoma County for wineries.
reviews.title: Ideal wine country base

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed March 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The Hampton is located in Windsor close to shopping mall and restaurants. It is near to all the great wineries in russian River, dry creek and Alexandria valley regions. The ramp to the 101 freeway is very close. The rooms are large and equipped with a small fridge and microwave. Complimentary breakfast is served daily with both hot foods and cold buffet items. Staff are friendly and helpful. Has a small exercise room and a pool to relax.
reviews.title: Great hotel; Professional staff

reviews.text: Purchased a voucher from Amazon Local for 1 night stay; included breakfast & coupons to local Sonoma county wineries. Our King room was roomy, comfy bed w/ down blanket & pillows. There is a small microwave & mini-fridge. This property is fairly new (~4 years old) and all the staff (from front desk, breakfast attendant, & housekeeping are all friendly & hard working). There is always a basket filled w/ fruit (apples, oranges) & an ice water dispencer in the lobby; in the afternoon, there are fresh baked cookies. The breakfast is more than continental fare & includes cheese omelet, turkey sausage, hot oatmeal, & a make-your-own waffle machine.
reviews.title: Excellent Stay

reviews.text: Nice positioning for Dry Creek Passport weekend. Small microwave and fridge in the room are nice. There's also a coffee-maker. Room is very clean and comfortable enough. Would've liked more than two bath sized towels for two people. There's some street noise if you're on the street side of the hotel. The thermostat and heater/AC are a bit loud, but I sleep with a white noise maker anyway. Light burned out in the bathroom. No staff on hand to fix in on a Thursday evening, but it was fixed (and a note left) during the day on Friday. Breakfast is pretty good except for the plastic scrambled eggs. Always some coffee and infused water available in the lobby. Front desk ran out of cookies on Sunday night, though. There's a convenient Applebee's next door, and a Safeway/Starbuck's a block away. If you are a walker, take a walk to Foothill park about a mile away. Very well located for making winery visits. Priced a bit high but this is Passport weekend.
reviews.title: Well-Located for Dry Creek Valley

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed April 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The Inn is right next to busy Highway 101 and fronts on another busy street across from a somewhat upscale strip mall. Nothing special to recommend it except if you aren't bothered by noise and want to pay less than for the more romantic and charming b&bs and hotels in the Sonoma wine country, then this may be the place for you. Even so, the price seems high for what you get.
reviews.title: Nothing special

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed April 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: I would highly recommend this hotel - it has a heated pool, very friendly staff and very accommodating. We prepaid and received a nice discount and when we walked in and mentioned we were Hilton Honors - they had already upgraded us to a Suite for the three nights we were there. Very clean and new facilty that is close to very good restaurants an shops in the town of Windsor.
reviews.title: Great hotel to stay in while visiting the wine country

reviews.text: Our family of four stayed at this very nice property not too long ago. The accommodations were very good. The double queen room was well-equipped with fridge and microwave. It had a large pool, but was cold! The spa was a better choice.
reviews.title: The Place to Stay in Winsor!

reviews.text: There was a variety of breakfast choices including hot items! We picked up a great deal through "Amazon Deals" for the $60 a night rate we paid, and we almost felt bad because it was a steal!
reviews.title: Comfortable...noisy heating unit...less than average breakfast

reviews.text: Can hear guests if too loud through the walls. Comfortable, rooms good size, but the bathroom was more commercial (no tub) and lacking in decor. The bed was above average in comfort, but if you need to do a lot of business on WiFi in the room, the internet is VERY slow.
reviews.title: Comfortable, above-average hotel. Good quality for the price.

reviews.text: I had purchased Vouchers through Amazon and gave them to 4 of my family members for xmas gifts and we all met up there this pass weekend and it was a very special stay for all of us. The rooms were clean, spacious and very quiet and both my husband and I could share the bathroom at the same time with plenty of space to spare! Downtown Windsor and not to far away Hearldsburg were absoulutly wonderful and anything you could possible need was located across the street. Its truely was a memorible weekend that everyone will remember. Thank you Hampton Inn and we can't wait to return again next year.
reviews.title: AWESOME FAMILY TRIP

reviews.text: M. Conn
reviews.title: Satisfactory property

reviews.text: This Hampton Inn is exactly what you would expect. No more. No less. Well equipped fitness center was appreciated. Room was adequate. Sink was stopped up but other than that it worked fine. Was at the corner of the 1st floor and the internet was inadequate. Had to use my phone as a hotspot. Staff were friendly and helpful. Works good for access to Windsor.
reviews.title: Clean and comfortable with decent location

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed February 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Hotel was clean and comfortable and located about a 20 minute drive from Healdsburg. Free breakfast was not exceptional but there were a number of decent breakfast staples making it convenient. Would stay again if rates were decent.
reviews.title: Great Choice and close to Healdsburg

aka: Hampton Inn And Suites Windsor - Sonoma Wine Country
description: Nestled between Santa Rosa and Healdsburg, the Hampton Inn & Suites Windsor-Sonoma Wine Country is the perfect new hotel from which to launch your next Sonoma County adventure! Surrounded by 100's of world-class wineries, we are a short drive to Lake Sonoma, Bodega Bay and the beach, or the Redwood Forest. We are also just minutes from the Russian River and an excellent starting point for your next bicycle adventure through the vineyard-covered countryside. The hotel features refrigerators and microwaves in every room and offers complimentary high-speed internet access to all guests - both wired and wireless. We also offer a free, full hot breakfast every morning to start your day off right. Of course your stay with us is 100% guaranteed, so book your next trip with confidence after reading what our guests are saying about us.
